    • Highlights

    • Discover the beauty of Ooty, the "Queen of Hill Stations," known for its lush landscapes, scenic lakes, and botanical gardens.
    • Enjoy panoramic views of the Nilgiri Mountains from Doddabetta Peak, the highest point in Ooty.
    • Experience a charming ride on the Nilgiri Mountain Railway (Toy Train), a UNESCO World Heritage Site.
    • Explore the serene hill station of Kodaikanal, famous for its misty hills, pristine lakes, and vibrant green valleys.
    • Visit iconic Kodaikanal attractions, including Coaker's Walk, Bryant Park, Pillar Rocks, and Kodaikanal Lake.
    • Relax by scenic lakes, enjoy boating, and explore beautiful tea estates along the way.
    • This tour offers a refreshing getaway into nature, with cool mountain air and stunning landscapes in both Ooty and Kodaikanal.

    Ooty Kodaikanal Short Tour - 5 Nights / 4 Days

    Day 1: Arrival in Ooty

    • Arrive in Ooty, the "Queen of Hill Stations," and transfer to your hotel.
    • Relax and unwind, then explore nearby attractions like Ooty Lake and Botanical Garden.
    • Enjoy a boat ride on Ooty Lake and stroll through the lush gardens.
    • Overnight stay at a hotel in Ooty.

    Day 2: Ooty Sightseeing

    • After breakfast, visit Doddabetta Peak for panoramic views of the Nilgiri mountains.
    • Explore the Tea Museum and enjoy a scenic train ride on the Nilgiri Mountain Railway (Toy Train).
    • Visit Rose Garden and spend the evening exploring the local markets.
    • Overnight stay at a hotel in Ooty.

    Day 3: Ooty to Kodaikanal

    • After breakfast, drive to Kodaikanal, enjoying the scenic route through Western Ghats.
    • Arrive in Kodaikanal and check in to your hotel.
    • Relax for the evening or explore Coaker’s Walk and Bryant Park.
    • Overnight stay at a hotel in Kodaikanal.

    Day 4: Kodaikanal Sightseeing

    • Visit the famous Kodaikanal Lake, where you can enjoy boating or a leisurely walk around the lake.
    • Explore Pillar Rocks, Green Valley View, and the beautiful Silver Cascade Waterfalls.
    • Discover unique attractions like the Guna Caves and Shenbaganur Museum of Natural History.
    • Overnight stay at a hotel in Kodaikanal.

    Day 5: Departure from Kodaikanal

    • After breakfast, check out and prepare for departure.
    • Transfer to the nearest airport or railway station for onward journey.
    • End of the Ooty Kodaikanal Short Tour.
